Free bump ;)
Oh man do I love it when you bump my Johnson, it sends me straight to the top! :D
Man, I LOVE your Johnson! There's just something about a well loved Johnson that that arouses something deep inside me. If I had the money that Johnson would be coming home with tonight!

Yeah his Johnson is REALLY solid. That's a real girthy holder too.
